user.title: Configure Eveus Connection
user.description:
Set up your Eveus charger connection and EV parameters.

Charger Connection:
- Enter your charger's IP address, username, and password
- Select your charger model (16A or 32A)

EV Configuration:
- Battery Capacity: Your EV's total battery capacity in kWh
- Initial SOC: Current state of charge when starting to charge
- Efficiency Loss: Typical charging losses (5-10%)
- Target SOC: Desired charging target (usually 80% for daily, 100% for trips)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please verify the IP address
